text: 27 is a year in the 1st century. It was a common year starting on Wednesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Piso and Frugi. == Events == *A fire in Rome. *A poorly-built stadium in Fidenae collapses, as 20,000 of the 50,000 spectators died. *Apricots are brought to Rome from Asia. *An Arc of triumph is built in Rimini, in honor of Augustus. *Baptism of Jesus, according to one dating scheme. == Births == *Agrippa II of Judea *Petronius, Roman writer *Wang Chong (Wang-Tch'oung), Chinese philosopher == Deaths == * Jesus of Nazareth Category:20s
